column6: Venus has been kidnapped and the Agents will scour the Earth to find her! To help find her, The Uranian needs a bigger boost to enable his mind to scan the globe, and intel suggests the one machine that can help is Cerebra! Prepare for a showdown!
column8: | colorist:Bettie Breitweiser | letterer:Joe Caramagna | penciller:Ed McGuinness | penciller:Carlo Pagualyan | penciller:Chris Samnee | writer:Jeff Parker
